title: Beirut Beirut
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Fast food, Salad bar, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Lebanese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Aug 2013 reported added meat to its menu and is no longer pure veg. Offers Lebanese falafel from Beirut which are vegan suitable. Optional dressings might contain egg and/or milk - ask.
